answers.answer: It's possible that she has a yeast infection.  But with all she has going on, you should not try home diagnosis.  Talk to her doctor.

question: My 95 yr. old Mother is having burning and pain in the genital area, labia, clitoris opening to vagina.also at this  same time edema on both lower legs and ankles.  She has developed Mirsa and is being treated at a wound ctr.  Both legs are wrapped and she is on a course of antibiotics.  Can the two conditions be related and if not what could cause the pain in the genital area?  She has not had a hysterectomy.  She has type II diabetes and pacemaker.
title: Joy Strickland
